# Sin
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Excel SIN(number): Returns the sine of the given number (angle in radians).

## Parameter

### Function name

The name of the Excel function

- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `SIN`
